Refactored RGB to Color, and added static methods to create a greyscale / rgb colour;
Added configuration options to allow changing of wasd vs arrow keys;
set background colour as config option; adjusted scene geometry;

issue.title: get z at a given x/y

issue.title: Movement of character sprite around the game
point in polygon algorithm/implementation
issue.body: do x/y components overlap with other vector3?

issue.title: bounding movement of sprite to edge of floor minus half the sprite (approx?)

comment.body: Implementation in #17 is to move the middle of the bottom edge of the sprite to the edge of the playable floor area -- this issue is to add e.g. a "buffer" at the edges to limit precisely how close to the walls the player may go.

issue.title: limiting movement of sprite to the "floor" surfaces
limiting movement of sprite to the "floor" surfaces

comment.body: completed for x/y coordinates -- not yet taking into account z coordinate (see #16)

commits.message: cropped sprite image and fixed the coordinate at which the sprite gets drawn (defaults to top-left corner, but we want the bottom-left for the player image);
partial progress toward making drawing of sprite to be at the middle of the bottom edge of the sprite;
